problem:
A line is parameterized by
\[\begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} 42 \\ -7 \end{pmatrix} + t \begin{pmatrix} -10 \\ 6 \end{pmatrix}.\]A second line is parameterized by
\[\begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} 87 \\ 48 \end{pmatrix} + u \begin{pmatrix} 3 \\ -2 \end{pmatrix}.\]If $\theta$ is the acute angle formed by the two lines, then find $\cos \theta.$
